alert.note: Alert for East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 10 at 3:59AM MDT until September 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR FOR HAINES INDEX OF 6..EXTREMELY LOW HUMIDITY..AND SIGNIFICANT WILDFIRE ACTIVITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 422 AND 475... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 422 Sawtooth Range/Northern Sawtooth NF and Fire Weather Zone 475 East Salmon River Mountains/Salmon NF. * TIMING...12 PM Sunday through 12 AM Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 6 percent. * HAINES INDEX...6 high. * IMPACTS...The extremely dry and unstable atmosphere may support rapid fire growth on established wildfires. Messick
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF
